content: 15 half_double_crochet 5 half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet decrease 4 fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing onto the body photo c set aside for sewing later @ 2024 willow&wild 24 4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet increase x 8 32 5 half_double_crochet 7 half_double_crochet increase x 4 36 slip_stitch and fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing onto the body attach almond to any stitch 6 in flo single_crochet slip_stitch in each stitch around 72 body fasten_off and set aside for sewing onto the body later photo d in sand begin by holding the head upside down and face pointing away from you note you will be placing 6 single_crochet into the e bottom of the head using round 13 as a guide for stitch placement you will start the row at the back of the head 1 6 single_crochet into head 6 photo e 2 half_double_crochet increase x 6 12 3 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet increase x 6 18 4 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet increase x 6 24 5 half_double_crochet around 24 6 half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet increase x 6 30 7-8 half_double_crochet around 30 2 rounds x 30 half_double_crochet = 60 half_double_crochet 9 half_double_crochet 3 half_double_crochet decrease x 6 24 10 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet decrease x 6 18 add extra half_double_crochet to get to the centre of the back do not fasten_off yet you will go directly to the leg instructions @ 2024 willow&wild all rights reserved squirt the turtle 5 of 6 legs lay the body flat to figure out how to place the legs there will be 5 stitches designated for each leg that will leave 8 stitches unworked recall that on the previous page that you added extra half_double_crochet to get to the centre of the back using stitch markers mark 5 stitches for each leg with a 4 stitch gap in between on each side photo f add extra half_double_crochet to get to the first st marker if needed first leg invisible colour change to aquatic leave a 10 yarn tail of sand for sewing later 1 slip_stitch single_crochet in the same st single_crochet increase x 4 10 photo g the slip_stitch helps reduce the appearance of the colour change 2 single_crochet 4 increase x 2 12 3 single_crochet 2 decrease x 3 9 4 single_crochet 1 decrease x 3 6 fasten_off and weave in tail photo h second leg add aquatic yarn to round 10 of body the second leg will be worked the same way as the first leg photo i use the 10 yarn tail to sew closed the gap between the legs photo j g h f i j @ 2024 willow&wild all rights reserved squirt the turtle 6 of 6 assembly k l attach the arms to round 2 of the body on either side photo k position the shell onto the
